description.value: 20 feet. A creature that enters the aura must succeed at a Will save or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure) and is then temporarily immune for 1 minute. Use the creature's spell DC or the DC of one of its existing abilities (whichever is highest), or set a DC based on the creature's level.
